about_the_game:
The Game

Fence is a Economic Management Simulator set in The Bronx during the early 1990’s. You play as Jimmy, a recently expelled high schooler that’s trying to make ends meet and keep him and his mother out of poverty, by trading some...not so legal things to some...questionable characters.

💰 Master the art of the deal 💰

Master the art of the deal with a economic trading system that reacts to you—deal with characters who have their own preferences and biases, navigate in game events that affect prices, and level up Jimmy’s skills to make each trade count. Start small by making low level trades of stolen electronics, jewelry and consumer goods, and work your way up to the heavy hitters!

🏢 Show your street smarts in a 1990's Bronx setting 🏢

Explore the Bronx in the 1990's, busy streets and graffitied alleyways filled with unique characters, each with up to 80 unique dialogues. From run down bodegas to smoky pawn shops and back alley exchanges. Jimmy’s journey takes him through encounters with locals who all play their parts—whether it's the wary bar owner, the streetwise kid, or the hardened gang lieutenant, each one has unique dialogue and insights to share.

🩸 Expand and Grow 🍀

Rise up the ranks of the 2 major gangs in the Bronx. Gain notoriety and climb the criminal ladder as you trade bigger, and riskier goods. With each trade you'll gain trust and access to the more and more illicit goods.

Features

  • Follow Jimmy's full story to get him and his mother out of poverty

  • Enhancing Jimmy's skills in appraisal, bartering and at the workbench

  • Upgrading your workbench to clean more sophisticated and hotter goods

  • Completing missions for the gangs in this part of the Bronx to gain rep and open up more lucrative goods to trade

  • Getting in trouble with the cops (maybe even raided!)

  • More selling and buying characters with their own needs and wants

  • Collecting 1990's nostalga sets and associated rewards

  • Purchase your very own pawn shop, to further your trade of illicit goods

and more to come.....

content_descriptors.notes: Fence has mature themes including criminal activity, specifically the trade of stolen goods, including illicit drugs. There is also depictions of alcohol and tabacco consumption.
